content: There's a bunch of miscellaneous work I want to do with initial and principal segments, but I'd rather place them in their own file first.
The thing is that I need initial segments for Kruskal-Katona (#2770) and I doubt what you are moving is the right concept.
If this isn't the right concept, then perhaps we can refactor it so that it is. But moving it out of the ordinal file would still be desirable in that case.
Just to be clear: the definition of an initial segment this gives is a relation embedding whose range is downwards closed.
